text: No current events at this time.
splitter: Days and times of the event:
exhibition/text: Center "Kupalinka" invites creative people to take an active part in the "Christmas-New Year Exhibition-Fair" of hand made souveniers. The application form for participation must be submitted in advance by phone: 303-386-4508, 720-412-4116. "Christmas-New Year Exhibition-Fair" is open to all comers to look and buy interesting souveniers. FREE ADMISSION!!!
